kv21.4:6.1_0: should not correct them like this:
kv21.4:6.2_0: “What is the instructions of the Buddhas?”
kv21.4:6.4_0: Non-human voicednes King Bimbisāra’s stilt house covered with gold netting?”
kv21.4:6.6_0: Pilindavaccha then focused his mind on turning King Bimbisāra’s stilt house into gold. And he filled with gold coins.
kv21.4:6.7_0: “There is he undertook the disciples of the Buddhas, for his disciples, or his disciples.”
kv21.4:6.8_0: The story at the psychic power of the psychic power is finished.
